title: Clinical Experience in Bioengineering
description: Capstone experiential learning course where students are to integrate bioengineering training and clinical medicine through lectures and rotations with clinical faculty. Students will identify problems with diagnostics, clinical practice, and/or treatment, and use engineering principles to design solutions. May be coscheduled with BENG 193. Prerequisites: BENG 294B; bioengineering MS medicine majors only or consent of department.
